survey_name: Consumer Preferences for Sustainable Fashion Brands Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand consumer preferences and behaviors regarding sustainable fashion brands, including purchasing habits, brand awareness, and factors influencing buying decisions.

questions.question_text: How often do you purchase clothing from sustainable fashion brands?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency. Ensure options cover a broad range of purchasing behaviors.

script.question_text: How often do you purchase clothing from sustainable fashion brands?

questions.question_text: Which of the following factors most influence your decision to buy sustainable fashion? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice to allow respondents to select multiple factors. Include an 'Other' option for additional inputs.

script.question_text: Which of the following factors most influence your decision to buy sustainable fashion? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What is the maximum price premium you are willing to pay for sustainable fashion compared to conventional fashion?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to gauge price sensitivity. Ensure options are clear and easy to understand.

script.question_text: What is the maximum price premium you are willing to pay for sustainable fashion compared to conventional fashion?

questions.question_text: Can you name any sustainable fashion brands you are aware of? (Please list up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to collect brand awareness data. Limit responses to 3 brands for clarity.

script.question_text: Can you name any sustainable fashion brands you are aware of? (Please list up to 3)

questions.question_text: What challenges do you face when trying to purchase sustainable fashion?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to uncover barriers. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What challenges do you face when trying to purchase sustainable fashion?
